login.title: Login
login.description: Please use the provided credentials to login in order to access restricted content

wifiportal-screen.title: Welcome to the Learner's Block
wifiportal-screen.content: Visit %hostname% in your browser to start using your device.

warning.title: Are you certain you want to reset the connection?
warning.content: If you proceed, the wifi connection will be reset and you will need to re-configure it.

success.title: Reset successful
success.content: Please connect to the lb.wifi network to re-configure the network connection.

error.title: Reset failed
error.content: The wifi connection could not be reset. Please try again.

disabled.title: Authentication disabled
disabled.description: You haven't created a user yet and anyone can currently access the settings pages. Please create account now.

success.title: Hostname updated
success.content: The hostname was successfully updated to %hostname%.local. The wifi network SSID has been updated to %ssid% and you will need to reconnect to this new network.

error.title: Request failed
error.content: An error occured and the hostname could not be changed.

warning.title: Are you certain you want to reset the database?
warning.content: If you proceed, the database will reset and all settings will be lost.

success.title: Reset successful
success.content: The database was reset succesfully. Please reload the app for changes to take effect.

error.title: Reset failed
error.content: An error occured and the database state could not be reset.

404.title: Well, this is awkward
404.description: The page you tried to reach doesn't exist.

500.title: Houston, we have a problem
500.description: The backend of the application is currently unreachable.
